DataElement.preferredName: Manufacturer Clinical Trial Expedited Safety Report Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods._Records describing relevant findings and notifications of unexpected serious adverse reactions and other safety information, which is submitted by a sponsor to regulatory authorities, investigators, and Institutional Review Boards (IRBs)/Independent Ethics Committees (IECs)._To take, accept, or get something offered._The procedure of having an identity established._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the name of a business engaged in manufacturing imaging equipment.

Concepts.definition: A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods.

Records describing relevant findings and notifications of unexpected serious adverse reactions and other safety information, which is submitted by a sponsor to regulatory authorities, investigators, and Institutional Review Boards (IRBs)/Independent Ethics Committees (IECs).

Property.preferredDefinition: Identified; having the identity known or established.

Concepts.definition: The procedure of having an identity established.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the name of a business engaged in manufacturing imaging equipment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
